members.joinCircumstances: Zenny fulfills his lifelong dream by forming a pirate crew with the goats of Goat Island.

keyMoments.title: Zenny's Dream Revealed
keyMoments.description: Zenny reveals his lifelong dream of becoming the Pirate King and forming his own crew, setting up the eventual formation of the Zenny Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the motivation behind the crew's eventual formation in the next episode.

ships.description: A ship Zenny built on the mountain over 20 years after being stranded on Goat Island.
